Portfolio

See our best work

Buddy

Buddy is a digital platform for providing ride-sharing services through mobile applications. The users can benefit from either solo or group rides using this platform. The system offers rides on a variety of vehicles throughout multiple routes of Dhaka city.

more

Wallet

Wallet functions as a platform for conducting digital financial transactions. Its users can send or receive specific amounts of money from their Wallet accounts. One can also purchase products from validated shopping stores using QR code generation.

more

Telvo

Telvo helps people to stay connected with each other by establishing a new digital platform of communication. The users of Telvo can call other members of this platform and send messages amongst themselves.

more

Pricewear

Pricewear is an e-commerce platform which brings in a wide range of products for its consumers. It provides convenience to the customers by enabling online payments and home delivery of purchased products.

comming soon
